name: finverse-compliance-cloud
description: Ultimate enterprise-grade trading compliance platform for Indian retail traders with AI-powered automation

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:infrastructure" "npm run dev:services" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:services: concurrently "npm run dev:api-gateway" "npm run dev:user-management" "npm run dev:broker-integration" "npm run dev:tax-engine" "npm run dev:compliance-engine" "npm run dev:portfolio-service" "npm run dev:document-service" "npm run dev:ai-trading-assistant"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:services && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:shared: npm run build:shared-types && npm run build:shared-utils && npm run build:shared-config && npm run build:shared-database
scripts.build:services: cd services && for dir in */; do cd "$dir" && npm run build && cd ..; done
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:shared && npm run install:services && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:shared: cd shared/types && npm install && cd ../utils && npm install && cd ../config && npm install && cd ../database && npm install
scripts.install:services: cd services && for dir in */; do cd "$dir" && npm install && cd ..; done
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf services/*/node_modules && rm -rf frontend/*/node_modules && rm -rf shared/*/node_modules && rm -rf shared/*/dist && rm -rf services/*/dist && rm -rf frontend/*/dist
scripts.setup: npm run clean && npm run install:all && npm run build && docker-compose up -d
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run dev
